0010000101101110 0001001001100111 0 -> sum: 0011001111010101, cout: 0

1010000001110001 0110011011000011 1 -> sum: 0000011100110101, cout: 1

1111000111000011 1000111010010111 1 -> sum: 1000000001011011, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
